src:
Jadwal Pertandingan Shopee Liga 1 Hari Ini, Rabu 6 November 2019
06 Nov 2019, 09:21 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pekan ke-27 kompetisi Shopee Liga 1 2019 telah memasuki hari ketiga. Ada tiga pertandingan yang akan dimainkan hari ini, Rabu (6/11/2019).
PSS Sleman menjamu Bali United, PSM Makassar meladeni tantangan Kalteng Putra, serta Persib Bandung bersua PSIS Semarang.
Seluruh pertandingan akan disiarkan secara langsung di Indosiar maupun O Channel, serta live streaming di Vidio.
Persib untuk kali pertama sejak medio September 2019, kembali bermain di Bandung saat menjamu tim lawan. Tak hanya senang bisa tampil di hadapan bobotoh di markas asli, tim Maung Bandung juga sedang diliputi percaya diri menyusul hasil dalam empat pertandingan terakhir yang tak terkalahkan.
Sementara itu, PSIS juga datang dengan modal apik, yakni kemenangan telak atas PSS pada laga sebelumnya (2/11/2019).
Di Makassar, PSM tak mau meremahkan Kalteng Putra, yang secara posisi di klasemen sementara, ada di zona degradasi. Namun, Tim Juku Eja punya catatan apik jika main di kandang sendiri.
Belum lagi, Kalteng Putra menelan kekalahan 0-2 dari Persib di markas sendiri pada laga pekan ke-26 (1/11/2019).
Di Sleman, tim tuan rumah PSS menghadapi pertandingan sulit karena bakal bertemu Bali United yang menduduki posisi puncak klasemen sementara Liga 1 2019. Namun, PSS tak mau berkecil hati.
Sebaliknya, tim asuhan pelatih Seto Nurdiyantoro ini ingin memanfaatkan absennya beberapa pilar Serdadu Tridatu dalam pertandingan nanti untuk meraup poin sempurna.
Berikut jadwal lengkapnya.
text:
Shopee League 1 Match Schedule Today, Wednesday 6 November 2019
Nov 6, 2019, 09:21 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Week 27 of the 2019 Shopee League competition has entered its third day. There are three matches that will be played today, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
PSS Sleman entertains Bali United, PSM Makassar serves the Kalteng Putra challenge, and Persib Bandung meets PSIS Semarang.
All matches will be broadcast live on Indosiar and O Channel, as well as live streaming on Video.
Persib for the first time since mid September 2019, returned to play in Bandung while entertaining the opposing team. Not only happy to appear before Bobotoh at the original headquarters, the Maung Bandung team is also filled with confidence following the results in the last four games that are unbeaten.
Meanwhile, PSIS also came with neat capital, namely a landslide victory over PSS in the previous match (2/11/2019).
In Makassar, PSM does not want to weaken Central Kalimantan Putra, which is positioned in the temporary standings, in the relegation zone. However, the Juku Eja Team has a neat record when playing at home.
Not to mention, Central Kalimantan Putra 0-2 defeat of Persib at its own headquarters in the match week 26 (1/11/2019).
In Sleman, the PSS host team faces a difficult match because it will meet Bali United who occupy the top position in the 2019 League 1 standings. However, PSS does not want to be discouraged.
On the other hand, coach Seto Nurdiyantoro's team wants to take advantage of the absence of several Serdadu Tridatu pillars in the match to get perfect points.
The following is the complete schedule.
